ConnectionStrings.WinAuth: Data Source=.\[Your SQL Server];Initial Catalog=[Your DB]; Integrated Security=true
ConnectionStrings.SQLConnStr: Application Name=your_API;Server=[Your SQL Server];initial catalog=[Your DB];User ID=[Don't use SA account :)];Password=your pwd;Encrypt=True;TrustServerCertificate=True;Integrated Security=False;Persist Security Info=False;
